Mr. Smith, can you please give me your best offer?
I can give you fifteen seconds of airtime for 2,500 dollars if you sign a contract for one hundred such ads.
But, your price is too high.
I am getting a quote for 2,000 dollars from a rival network.
Their viewership is also 30 percent smaller than ours.
It actually works out to be more expensive.
Well, I never negotiated the deal with them.
Let's do this: give me a rate of 2,000 dollars, and I'll sign the contract.
I don't think we can afford it.
Check it up with your boss.
I am sure he'll give you a go-ahead.
